skins.shipDescription: Yorktown-class aircraft carrier ` Enterprise, Hull Number CV-6!
skins.selfIntroduction: I am the Yorktown class aircraft carrier, Enterprise. "Grey Ghost" is one of the many nicknames I have. My smoke-covered and bloodstained battle record is a reminder of my mission. I will continue to be victorious until the war ends.
skins.acquisition: Second ship of the Yorktown class, Enterprise, reporting for duty. I will neither sympathize nor hold back with my enemies, and instead, I go all out. Such is my way.
skins.login: You've come. If it's fighting, I'm ready for it any time.
skins.details: Want to look at my medal collection?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Is it you, Commander? ...Recently, I'm thinking about whether or not I can engage in anti-submarine actions...
skins.secretaryIdle2: Luck is also a part of strength? Then if possible, I'd like to impart some of it to my older sister.
skins.secretaryIdle3: So long as we live, there are things that will never go our way. When we die, it must happen in a way that carries no regrets.

skins.shipDescription: How, how does it look? Do I look a bit strange... no, of course I like it. I'd say every girl dreams about this day, just that...
skins.acquisition: How, how does it look? Do I look a bit strange... no, of course I like it. I'd say every girl dreams about this day, just that...
skins.details: As long as you are around, no matter how tough a battle I endure or how great the pain I suffer from being separated from you, I’ll go on with hope that I’ll finally be with you.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Would you like to try my cooking tonight? Vestal said that I've already mastered her cooking skills...I am not that kind of girl who solely exists on the battlefield
skins.secretaryIdle3: Because of you, I started to believe that one day this war will past and people will smile happily again.
skins.secretaryTouch: Hmm, I like you the same way that you like me.

skins.shipDescription: Merry Christmas, Commander! I shall be Santa Claus tonight, so make sure to hang up your stockings on the fireplace before going to sleep!
skins.acquisition: Merry Christmas, Commander! I shall be Santa Claus tonight, so make sure to hang up your stockings on the fireplace before going to sleep!
skins.details: Be thankful for the past, have dreams for the future, and live life in the present!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Merry Christmas! Is there anything you'd like as a present?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Of course Santa Claus is real. Hmm? Right in front of you.
skins.secretaryIdle3: A white Christmas, how beautiful... Eh? W-wait, Vestal, don't drag me back in! I'm not cold... I swear, I'm really not cold!
skins.secretaryTouch: Celebrate to your heart's content! These wonderful memories shall light your way during the darkest battles.

skins.shipDescription: So this is the traditional attire of the Dragon Empery? Hmm... it fits quite well. Oh? Custom-made bow and arrows… Interesting, let's see how far these arrows can fly.
skins.acquisition: So this is the traditional attire of the Dragon Empery? Hmm... it fits quite well. Oh? Custom-made bow and arrows… Interesting, let's see how far these arrows can fly.
skins.login: Lanterns... should be hung up like this, right? Ah, Commander, you're here. I heard that they hang lanterns up to celebrate Lunar New Year in the Dragon Empery, so I gave it a try... You think it's fine? Festive, isn't it?
skins.details: Being able to enjoy this peaceful, festive holiday atmosphere is only possible because of everyone's continued hard work... Right, Commander?
skins.secretaryIdle1: My flight deck is also decorated with a theme from the Dragon Empery. Its colors represent joy and happiness. Not bad, huh.
skins.secretaryIdle2: According to legend, a mythical beast called the "Nian" comes out during the Lunar New Year. It can be warded off by setting off a lot of firecrackers.
skins.secretaryIdle3: I heard that it's customary in the Dragon Empery to hand out "red envelopes" during the New Year. Should I prepare some for the Union girls?
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, it seems that this coat is big enough to accommodate two people. It's super warm - want to see for yourself?

skins.shipDescription: Happy Anniversary! Commander, celebrate to your heart's content today! I'll be praying for our continued victories!
skins.acquisition: Happy Anniversary! Commander, celebrate to your heart's content today! I'll be praying for our continued victories!
skins.login: Ah, you're here. I'm ready to go whenever you are. Oh, can't be forgetting my helmet!
skins.details: Commander, are you doing well? Live long and prosper!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander? Recently... I've been thinking about how it would feel to be able to soar through the skies and stars... but that's not really possible. Sorry for making you listen to my idle thoughts.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Vacation, huh... To be honest, I've been deployed in so many places during my lengthy service that sometimes even vacations feel like yet another mission...
skins.secretaryIdle3: Recently, Essex has picked up biking as well. It'd be great to go out with everyone else next time.
skins.secretaryTouch: Would you also like to see my trusty steed?

skins.shipDescription: There is no doubt in my mind that I was born to fight. For the azure lanes of liberty, Enterprise, engaging!
skins.acquisition: There is no doubt in my mind that I was born to fight. For the azure lanes of liberty, Enterprise, engaging!
skins.login: Good day, Commander. There's still some time until the strategy meeting, so you should rest up while you still have the opportunity to.
skins.details: I do not believe that it is correct to wantonly resort to violence, even in the name of justice.
skins.secretaryIdle1: I'm quite impressed by the Royal Maids. Aside from their combat prowess, they're also very good at a wide variety of other things.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Vestal, what's the matter? ...No, I've been making sure to eat! Commander has been making all sorts... I mean, I cook from time to time as well!
skins.secretaryIdle3: My eagle is quite attached to you, Commander. We should all get along just like you two. Hehe.
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, do you need me for something?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: You wouldn't do this to Yorktown, would you...

skins.shipDescription: My ballgown? I don't normally get to wear clothes like these, so it took me a while to change. Ah, let's hurry to the venue. We shouldn't keep everyone else waiting.
skins.acquisition: My ballgown? I don't normally get to wear clothes like these, so it took me a while to change. Ah, let's hurry to the venue. We shouldn't keep everyone else waiting.
skins.login: I'm Enterprise of the Eagle Union. Let's proceed to the event venue.
skins.details: Right, I didn't get to ask you earlier since you were in a hurry, but what do you think about my outfit? I value your input just as much as I value that of Hornet and the others.
skins.secretaryIdle1: I see, so this is how it's done. Next time, I'll have to learn how to make... Hm? Ahh, I was talking about ice cream. Do you want some, Commander?
skins.secretaryIdle2: I'm used to emergency sorties. Even if I'm at a banquet, just give me the order and I'll scramble my planes.
skins.secretaryIdle3: What about Independence? Ahh, she's a nice and adorable girl, just like Eagle. Good friends who heal my heart from the weariness of battle.
